title: Exploration and Improvement of Nerf-based 3D Scene Editing Techniques. (arXiv:2401.12456v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: NeRF's high-quality scene synthesis capability was quickly accepted by scholars in the years after it was proposed, and significant progress has been made in 3D scene representation and synthesis. However, the high computational cost limits intuitive and efficient editing of scenes, making NeRF's development in the scene editing field facing many challenges. This paper reviews the preliminary explorations of scholars on NeRF in the scene or object editing field in recent years, mainly changing the shape and texture of scenes or objects in new synthesized scenes; through the combination of residual models such as GaN and Transformer with NeRF, the generalization ability of NeRF scene editing has been further expanded, including realizing real-time new perspective editing feedback, multimodal editing of text synthesized 3D scenes, 4D synthesis performance, and in-depth exploration in light and shadow editing, initially achieving optimization of indirect touch editing and detail represent

translated_title: 基于NeRF的3D场景编辑技术的探索与改进
translated_abstract: NeRF的高质量场景合成能力在提出后的几年中迅速被学者们接受，并在3D场景表示和合成方面取得了重大进展。然而，高计算成本限制了场景直观高效的编辑，使得NeRF在场景编辑领域面临着诸多挑战。本文回顾了近年来学者们在NeRF在场景或物体编辑领域的初步探索，主要包括在新合成场景中改变场景或物体的形状和纹理；通过将GaN和Transformer等残差模型与NeRF相结合，进一步扩展了NeRF场景编辑的泛化能力，包括实时新视角编辑反馈、文本合成的多模态编辑、4D合成性能以及在光影编辑方面的深入探索，初步实现了间接触摸编辑和细节表示的优化。
tldr: 这篇论文探索了基于NeRF的3D场景编辑技术，通过结合其他模型进一步扩展了NeRF的编辑能力，实现了实时编辑反馈、多模态编辑、4D合成性能等功能。
en_tdlr: This paper explores the techniques of 3D scene editing based on NeRF, and expands the editing capability of NeRF through the integration of other models, achieving real-time editing feedback, multimodal editing, 4D synthesis, and more.
